alert.note: Alert for Estill (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 03 at 6:22PM EST until January 04 at 2:12PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... Red River at Clay City affecting Powell and Estill Counties. Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County. For the Kentucky River...including Ravenna...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kentucky River near Ravenna. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Low lying areas flood. Red Lick Road, Millers Creek Road, Dark Hollow Road, and Noland Creek Road flood in several places. At 21.5 feet, Sang Branch Road is under water at Red Lick Creek. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:15 PM EST Monday the stage was 27.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is falling, but will continue to run well above flood stage through tonight. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by 11 PM.
